page.title: 14Cobham Primary School
page.content: There are one hundred and thirty children spread over four classes,we have got five teachers,(two are part time)plus one head teacher,makes six. The school consists of two infant classes,which are Victorian,and two junior classes which were built in the early nineteen sixties.School lasts from nine o'clock till half past three.At lunch time the majority eat a packed lunch and the minority eats a hot dinner.I am in the top class.We usually do maths,english,music, Physical Exersize,science,R.E. and reading.Reading is my favourite subject.I read Fighting Fantasy.These are "choose your own adventure" books. I sit next to Martin and Nicky.There are a couple of unsavoury characters but most are O.K.
